name: The Walten Files Welcome Back Sophie
name_original: The Walten Files Welcome Back Sophie
description: THE WALTEN FILES WELCOME BACK SOPHIE is a game were you play as Sophie exploring the K9 storage facility. The showstoppers are in there with you and you need to survive until 7:00 AM. This game was made for halloween but i did not have enough time to get the game to be that big at all. So im going to be updating the game so It can be as big as it possibly can! You can help too by reporting bugs so I can fix them! If you enjoy this than make sure to share it with your friends, your relatives, peers, and even your dog! And do not be shy to give suggestions on how to make the game better! I will also be updating this page to show how the game is coming along!
